title: Internal Gaming: Join and grow your channel!

embed.description: Step up your game with a modern voice & text chat app. Crystal clear voice, multiple server and channel support, mobile apps, and more. Get your free server now!

body:
Greetings, My name is Internal Malice and I am here to invite you to join our growing gaming community “Internal Gaming”

Internal Gaming is a community of gamers who are looking to find purpose in gaming. We build lasting friendships and relations and aim to take you back to the social atmosphere of local co-op and lan parties. We seek to do this by hosting community events (some listed below) and games outside of just league. We plan on running tournaments, hosting/recording coaching lessons and creating team based contests that will lead to rewards. If you would like to learn more about us, come join the discord and check out our “about” page listed in the “Learn more” folder.

Just to quickly share, here are some activities we do :
Karaoke nights
Anime/Movie viewing parties
Live streams and giveaways
Tournaments
Coaching
Party games (Jack Box, Cards against humanities)
Discord bot games (Currently only pokemon)

Another part of what Internal Gaming is about, is investing in each other. By this I mean we support our fellow streamers. In our community we have a level system from a commonly used to to help measure activity in the discord. Upon reaching level ten (can be reached in 3-7 days if you are active) you will receive the “Content Creator” which will give you access to a channel to promote your own channel when you go live. However, we understand that often, that is not enough. So what we do to help, is that every week we use a randomizer to randomly select two members with the “Content Creator” to be specially listed in our featured streamers section. They will also be allowed to @everyone once a day for the week to help get attention for their stream. We also occasionally have paid commission based position open for different projects. In time to come, we may even offer regular partner positions to pay content creators to help create content for Internal Gaming.

As we all know, anything worth wild takes times and effort. As of right now, we are still in are beginning stages and will need help to make it all come together. As of right now, the best way to help is to join the community and play with us. If you are like me, and believe I.G can be something huge and are looking to be more involved, go visit our “learn more” channel to see how else you can support or join the team. We are currently looking to recruit moderators and admins

This has been Internal Malice from Internal Gaming, and I thank you for your time. See you on the rift summoner!

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body: Do you have to be a League content creator or is any kind acceptable?

> [{quoted}](name=Hotarµ,realm=NA,application-id=EBBIvmVK,discussion-id=F9Ha7iw5,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-01-12T05:39:30.870+0000)
>
> Do you have to be a League content creator or is any kind acceptable?

Any is acceptable. I primary stream other games and am doing a music thing on the side. We are trying to entice streamers to meet, mingle support, and even collaborate by presenting them with an engaging  community and audience.  The premise is mostly the more you put in, the more you get out of it.

Spamming this across multiple sections was bad enough, but you really don't need to spam bumps as well.

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-discussion/elHa8c1V-internal-gaming-a-growing-community
https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/memes/nlVqBwFy-internal-gaming-gaming-memes-community-and-more

Thank you for taking notice. We are trying hard to get the word out there, and while some people do not like it, it has worked wonders in the past to help get us in the listing and get people to check us out and join on board.  Come check us out and join us for a game or two? Also, two of your links seem to be broken? I only see we have two listing at this point in time

> [{quoted}](name=InternalMalice,realm=NA,application-id=EBBIvmVK,discussion-id=F9Ha7iw5,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2019-01-15T08:15:47.131+0000)
>
> Thank you for taking notice. We are trying hard to get the word out there, and while some people do not like it, it has worked wonders in the past to help get us in the listing and get people to check us out and join on board.  Come check us out and join us for a game or two? Also, two of your links seem to be broken? I only see we have two listing at this point in time

Those links are broken because the threads were deleted, probably due to being considered spam and inappropriate to those sections.

Do you notice anything problematic about "while some people do not like it, it has worked wonders"?

> [{quoted}](name=KFCeytron,realm=NA,application-id=EBBIvmVK,discussion-id=F9Ha7iw5,comment-id=000500000000,timestamp=2019-01-15T08:27:44.888+0000)
>
> Those links are broken because the threads were deleted, probably due to being considered spam and inappropriate to those sections.
> 
> Do you notice anything problematic about "while some people do not like it, it has worked wonders"?

:D
A few people have already joined! yay

I do not. I learned both on the rift and in real life that it is impossible to please everyone, and that some people just won't like you. Heck, there are entire swaths of people who would will dislike you just for having the gull to try something they wish they could of done themselves. I understand I can't paint everyone with that bush, and fortunately I don't have to, there is no reason to. This because the results have shown in the past and I am use they will show now, that despite disagreements, more people are in support my efforts then those who would like to see me fail.  So I keep on trying and keep putting my self out there for those would would be interested. Those who are not interested can just pass on by, and many do! Nothing wrong with that, its just how the game is play haha :)
